original_text: Everyone was talking about Jesus. They were surprised at the good way in which he spoke. They said to each other, ‘We know that he is only Joseph's son.’
korean_text: 그들이 다 그를 증언하고 그 입으로 나오는 바 은혜로운 말을 놀랍게 여겨 이르되 이 사람이 요셉의 아들이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: They were surprised at the good way
We know that he is only Joseph's son
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 요셉의 아들뿐이라는 것을 압니다
